scenes.name: Main Hall
scenes.summary: a warm, modestly sized castle hall
desc: You stand in the ancient, central hall of Caranae Keep, one of the oldest castles in all of Dostrie. The hearth in the center is by no means the
largest in the region, but it is the most well known. On the long walls hang several banners of the House Garraves.

scenes.name: North Wing
desc: You are in a carpeted hallway with well-worn masonry walls. On the west side of the hallway you can see the courtyard through glass windows.

scenes.name: North Corridor
desc: You are in a quiet hallway. Along the torchlit walls are alcoves with busts of former nobles, as well as family portraits and landscapes.

scenes.name: South Wing
desc: You are in a carpeted hallway with well-worn masonry walls. On the west side of the hallway you can see the courtyard through glass windows.

scenes.name: South Corridor
desc: You are in a quiet hallway. Along the torchlit walls are alcoves with busts of former nobles, as well as family portraits and landscapes.

scenes.name: Courtyard
desc: The courtyard at Caranae Keep is without a doubt its centerpiece. Surrounding you are hedges that climb the walls of the keep and give way to
banners of ivy leaves and moss laden with pink and white flowers. A small dirt stone path leads visitors past the fountain in the center as they
traverse. The aroma of the herbs and flowers growing in the garden plots fill your body with warmth and ease.

scenes.name: Bath House
desc: While bathhouses are common in cities across Calomeia, it is rare for a Castle to have its own communal bath. You see in the center a large bath
with rising from the surface of the water. At the westernmost wall you can see a table with an hourglass and a few signs, attended by a servant
of the castle to monitor the hours of men's, women's and mixed bathing.

scenes.name: Entrance
scenes.summary: inside the walls of the keep
desc: You stand before the doors to the ancient castle at Caranae. Armored guards patrol the walls and grounds, staring at everything that comes through
the front gates. Messengers and other petitioners stand before the large doors of the main hall demanding entrance, and are vetted by a steward with
tired, dead eyes.

scenes.name: Castle Smithy
scenes.summary: a shop with a shield emblem hanging above its entrance
desc: Caranae has two blacksmiths. The one in the city proper is more general purpose, providing common household goods and fixtures as well as simple
defensive weaponry for travellers. Here, however, %blacksmith% and his apprentices provide only the best weapons and armor to the city watch and
the Garraves' House Guard.

scenes.name: Castle Stables
desc: These are the royal stables, where the steeds of the high court as well as any guests of the court are housed while they are staying in the keep.
The wonderful smell of horse waste greets your nostrils as you take in the surroundings, and it reminds you that no matter how noble the steed,
their shit still stinks.
